name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel
looks: The sword has a long, straight blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is made of polished steel and wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sharp steel sword, perfect for slicing through enemies.
looks: The steel sword has a long, straight blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is made of leather and wrapped in a criss-cross pattern for a secure grip.

name: Silver Ring
description: A simple silver ring, often worn for its aesthetic value.
looks: The silver ring is a plain band made of sterling silver. It has a smooth and polished surface, reflecting light with a subtle shine.

name: Silver Longsword
description: A finely crafted longsword made of silver, designed to deal extra damage to supernatural creatures.
looks: The Silver Longsword has a gleaming blade made of pure silver, with intricate engravings depicting various mythical creatures. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with a silver pommel in the shape of a wolf's head.

special_weapon_skills.silver_smite: Grants a chance to deal bonus damage to supernatural creatures.

name: Golden Ring
description: A luxurious ring made of solid gold.
looks: The golden ring is crafted from pure gold and has a smooth, polished surface. It is designed with an intricate pattern of filigree and has a sparkling diamond in the center.

name: Adamantine Sword
description: A sword forged from the rare and indestructible metal known as Adamantine.
looks: The Adamantine Sword has a sleek and elegant design, with a polished silver blade and a hilt adorned with intricate carvings. The blade is sharp and gleaming, reflecting light with every movement.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.adamantine_strike: Has a chance to ignore a portion of enemy's armor.

name: Arcane Staff
description: A powerful staff imbued with arcane energy.
looks: The Arcane Staff is a tall, wooden staff with intricate carvings and glowing magical runes. At the top, a crystal orb emanates a soft, pulsating light.

special_weapon_skills.spellcasting: Increases the power and effectiveness of spells cast with the staff.

name: Steel Helmet
description: A sturdy helmet made of steel
looks: The helmet is made of smooth steel with a silver tint. It has a visor that can be opened and closed.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy and sharp sword made from steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip, and the pommel is adorned with a decorative design.

special_weapon_skills.sword_mastery: Grants bonus damage and accuracy when using swords.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword, suitable for beginners
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a simple crossguard and a leather grip. The blade is slightly tarnished and shows signs of use.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of gauntlets made of steel
looks: The gauntlets are made of polished steel and have a sturdy construction. They cover the hands and extend up to the wrists, providing excellent protection.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade
looks: The iron sword has a simple design, with a straight steel blade and a basic hilt. It is well-balanced and has a sharp edge.

special_weapon_skills.sword_skill: Increases damage and accuracy when wielding a sword.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel
looks: The sword has a long, straight blade and a hilt wrapped in leather for a secure grip. The blade has a silver finish and is engraved with intricate patterns.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made from solid steel
looks: The steel gauntlets are thick and have a plated design with reinforced knuckles. They have a black leather lining for comfort.

name: Fireball Staff
description: A staff infused with the power of fire, allowing the wielder to unleash devastating fireball attacks.
looks: The Fireball Staff is a long wooden staff with intricate carvings along its length. At the top of the staff, there is a crystal orb that glows with a fiery red light.

special_weapon_skills.Fire Magic: Increases damage and effectiveness of fire-based spells.

special_effects.Fireball: Allows the wielder to cast powerful fireball spells.
